reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price
reviews.author: Edward
reviews.content: Needed an inexpensive watch after mine broke.Was worried that the wrist band would not fit.This is a great watch with a great price.wrist band fit just right.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 29, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value in a Solid Watch
reviews.author: snailmartyr
reviews.content: Took a chance and bought on sale for a pittance (bought 2 at the price). Pleasantly surprised. The dial is easy to read (day/night), feels solid with just the right amount of heft... I even like the wristband. I can't remember the last time I didn't feel the need to order a separate NATO style wristband for a new watch purchase (I average around 2 years per watch before something catastrophic happens). If I had to say something negative, it is a little hard to read the date. That's a common complaint with me though and not worth deducting a star over. Comes nicely packaged in it's own cloth envelope.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 24, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keeps time well
reviews.author: Kenneth H.
reviews.content: My son spent $700 on a smart watch. The thing does everything except his laundry. This watch was only about $10. Like its namesake, it isn't very smart but at least it keeps time well. Unfortunately it doesn't know what day of the month it is unless you adjust it frequently as it thinks every month has 31 days.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 6, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LN LENQIN Mens Watch
reviews.author: Art
reviews.content: Watch is suprisingly nice. Im sort of rough on watches so this is a safe beater. The band is rubber and very soft. I did throw a different band on it, a gray sailcloth band. Check it out. Ive been wearing it for about a week and is pretty rugged.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 13, 2024

reviews.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Amazon over-bills cheap watch
reviews.author: Ronald E. Macika
reviews.content: Cheap watch does tell time. Date function has a mind of its own. Does not glow in the dark and does not show military time. Worst of all this is a $13.99 watch (plus tax of course) and my Amazon credit card shows billing over $45 for this thing and I have no idea how to try to get that mischarge removed from my Amazon card. I'm sending it back and I have been told that I'll get credit for the $13.99 but hey what about this over-billing? All of this craziness because I simply wanted a cheap watch to just tell time to avoid pulling out my cell phone to check the time time. Makes you long for the bad old days of Super-Kmart stores 👍
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best watch I’ve had
reviews.author: Zeno2019
reviews.content: Came in a nice case was easy to set time and day it works great as it should and helps understand the military time looks sleek and simpleI highly recommend it for the price it’s a great watch
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 28, 2024

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars good watch for casual dressing
reviews.author: J M
reviews.content: I recently purchased the LN LENQIN Analog Quartz Sports Unisex Watch and I couldn't be more pleased with my choice. Not only does this watch offer a sleek and stylish design that can be effortlessly paired with any outfit, but its functionality is top-notch as well. The watch is 30M waterproof, making it perfect for everyday wear and ensuring durability.One of the standout features of this watch is its versatility. Designed for both men and women, it's great for those looking for a unisex option that doesn't compromise on style. The analog quartz movement provides accurate timekeeping, while the comfortable strap ensures a snug and secure fit on the wrist.Overall, I highly recommend the LN LENQIN Men's Analog Quartz Sports Unisex Watch to anyone in search of a reliable timepiece that seamlessly combines fashion and function. It's a great value for the price and has quickly become a staple in my daily wardrobe."
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States March 28, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black/Silver
reviews.author: Maelyn & Kevin
reviews.content: I play bass and needed a lightweight watch for that. It’s perfect. Don’t even know it’s there until I need to know the time.Keep in mind this is an $11 watch. Once we have that in place, this is a 5 star watch for the price. The band is unbelievably comfy, the casing is plastic and appears to be solid enough. It comes in packaging that seems to exceed its price range.Easy to set up.SleekTons of size notches for almost any size wrist11/10 highly recommended.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 15, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars overall good for the price
reviews.author: jason jolgren
reviews.content: overall good for the price. I'm a larger man and the fit is fine. The reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is because the "glow hands" don't glow at all. For me that was not a big deal but keep that in mind you can't read the hands in the dark.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 15, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and good quality
reviews.author: omaris sanchez
reviews.content: I got this watch for nursing school and all the other girls asked me for the link to buy this watch! It’s very lightweight and the band feels buttery soft. I think it’s better than the Apple Watch bands. I would 100% recommend!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2024
